mapper.select: SELECT ur.rol_id FROM user_role as ur WHERE use_id = #{useId} AND is_deleted = b'0'

SELECT u.id AS user_id , u.name, u.position, u.email, u.state, r.* FROM user AS u LEFT JOIN user_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.use_id LEFT JOIN `role` AS r ON ur.rol_id = r.id WHERE u.office_id = #{officeId} AND u.is_deleted = b'0' OR u.is_deleted = null ORDER BY u.create_time DESC
